meanings.sent1: The landholders in our town take care of their farms.
meanings.sent2: The landholders received a tax bill for their properties.
meanings.sent3: The landholders organized a picnic on their vast estates.
meanings.sent4: The landholders are the kings and queens of their own domains.
meanings.sent5: The landholders proudly watch over their acres of fields and forests.

meanings.definition: Those who hold title to land.
meanings.sent1: The landholders have legal documents proving their ownership.
meanings.sent2: The landholders gathered to discuss property boundaries.
meanings.sent3: The landholders joked about having a 'land title party'.
meanings.sent4: The landholders are the rightful rulers of their plots of earth.
meanings.sent5: The landholders' titles symbolize their connection to the land.
